name: CreateMailchimpSegment
description:
Create a new segment in a specific Mailchimp list.

This tool is used to create a new segment within a specified Mailchimp list. It should be called when you need to categorize or target specific subsets of your mailing list for marketing purposes.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp list where the new segment will be created.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: segment_name
parameters.description: The name of the segment to be created in Mailchimp.

parameters.name: emails_for_static_segment
parameters.description: An array of emails for creating a static segment. An empty array means no subscribers. Cannot be used with 'options'.

value_schema.description: An array of emails to be used for a static segment. Any emails provided that are not present on the list will be ignored. Passing an empty array will create a static segment without any subscribers. This field cannot be provided with the options field.

parameters.name: segment_match_type
parameters.description: Specifies the match type for the segment conditions. Use 'any' to match any condition and 'all' to match all conditions.

parameters.name: segment_match_conditions
parameters.description: Array of conditions to define how the segment matches subscribers. Refer to the Mailchimp documentation for various condition types.

value_schema.description: Segment match conditions. There are multiple possible types, see the [condition types documentation](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/alternative-schemas/#segment-condition-schemas).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: static_segment
parameters.description: An array of emails to be used for a static segment. Any emails provided that are not present on the list will be ignored. Passing an empty array will create a static segment without any subscribers. This field cannot be provided with the options field.

value_schema.description: An array of emails to be used for a static segment. Any emails provided that are not present on the list will be ignored. Passing an empty array will create a static segment without any subscribers. This field cannot be provided with the options field.

parameters.name: options.conditions
parameters.description: Segment match conditions. There are multiple possible types, see the [condition types documentation](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/alternative-schemas/#segment-condition-schemas).

value_schema.description: Segment match conditions. There are multiple possible types, see the [condition types documentation](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/alternative-schemas/#segment-condition-schemas).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
